resources.string: > Make sure you have a active internet connection.
> All the background services would be temporarily blocked while using the app except for those required to run the app.
> Make sure you have connected with the external finger-print scanner.
> Default phone gestures would no tbe available use manual back and exit button given in the app
> Minimisation of the app is blocked .
> Any violation of the check point in any point of using the app will lead to immediate exit of the app.
